Description: Gotham Men's Gold-Tone 17 Jewel Mechanical Dual Time Zone Pocket Watch # GWC14046G FEATURES Classic and elegant gold-tone 17 jewel mechanical dual time zone open face exhibition pocket watch with Roman numeral dial Beautiful exhibition case back showing all moving parts Rich antique style blue cobalt hour, minute and seconds hands plus scratch resistant mineral crystal Includes matching 15" curb pocket watch chain with spring ring attachment Arrives with deluxe draw string pouch and gift box, Selvyt polishing cloth, operating instructions and lifetime limited warranty card DESCRIPTION This classic and elegant reproduction style pocket watch from Gotham is the perfect addition to anyone's timepiece collection. Features include a brilliant dual time zone sun/moon 17 jewel mechanical movement with elegant blue cobalt hands, open exhibition front and back display protected by scratch resistant mineral crystals, highly polished brass gold-tone case and a classic pumpkin crown. In addition, this watch includes a 15 inch steel curb chain that can attach to your belt loop. As always, your watch will arrive beautifully gift packaged and include operating instructions, lifetime limited warranty and a Selvyt polishing cloth to keep your watch clean. This is truly a beautiful watch at a great price. Enjoy.
